review_body: Pretty awesome app to view your Azure resources. Clean and simple app interface. Drawback includes limited support for actually controlling these resources. I would say use this app for checking the status of your Azure resources on the go. Hopefully future updates will add greater controlling capab...Full ReviewPretty awesome app to view your Azure resources. Clean and simple app interface. Drawback includes limited support for actually controlling these resources. I would say use this app for checking the status of your Azure resources on the go. Hopefully future updates will add greater controlling capabilities.

Suddenly this app has stopped working. It continuously asking for sign in organization page. Despite of successfully providing organization username and password and authenticating with Microsoft Authenticator App with code or even approve button, it simply doesn't login. Keep asking organization cr...Full ReviewSuddenly this app has stopped working. It continuously asking for sign in organization page. Despite of successfully providing organization username and password and authenticating with Microsoft Authenticator App with code or even approve button, it simply doesn't login. Keep asking organization credentials again and then code and then again credentials and then code and again... Endless... This was never the case earlier.dont know what has changed. App is now useless since I can't login

Microsoft Azure is the perfect platform used for many purposes including storage, database evaluation, and networking. I have had a positive experience with Azure and highly recommend it to anyone who doesn't necessarily have the principal to buy the resources that Azure offers.
Good first experience so far. Easy to use and fast in speed. I move my SAP Business One to Azure from Newtek One. So much faster and economical than Newtek One.
Portal functionality is very limited. Unless you memorize the commands to create resources, this application can merely be used for tracking and monitoring your resources. Room for improvement.
Useful for alerts and see a quick status of your services. What would be really nice is too have also a cost dashboard.

Not much to do tbh. Useful for control the VMs and nothing else... I wish I had AAD, Intune, identity Protection, Azure Security Center, Sentinel dashboards minimum. At this state it's not Azure app, it's rather Azure VM list.
Great app. Works very well and allows me to manage my Azure environment very quickly
Completely pointless, I was expecting this to allow me to perform some administrative tasks on our tenantcy. It needs some serious work and features added for it to be worth installing.
I am very disappointed, the UI sucks, there is no darkmode, you cant add or remove resources and the information available is sparse at best.
Amazing App. I would have given it 5 stars if only it showed me my Azure Credit Balance when I open the app
I cant acces AZURE DEVOPS board from this app. It seems the devop service is not integrated with Azure cloud. I wish there was a mobile app for Azure Devops boarfs.
All the extensions and add ons to gather up any and all system and file apps is amazing.I am impressed.

Whats the app Actually do? As a TFS user moving to Azure i want to know what builds have failed. If i am running out of space somewhere, if i need to trigger a house keeping job. How does my Work Items queue look. What action do i need to take. Are there any pressure points building up in any of my ...Full ReviewWhats the app Actually do? As a TFS user moving to Azure i want to know what builds have failed. If i am running out of space somewhere, if i need to trigger a house keeping job. How does my Work Items queue look. What action do i need to take. Are there any pressure points building up in any of my architectures. What can i do now and what do i have to do in the office. What SDK is there to drive this app so i am always connected. What youtube vids are there to lever this tool - none.
Combining this app with the RD Client on a DeX mounted Samsung phone eliminates the need to carry a laptop!
I use this app to manage my web applications instead of using the web portal. It has a friendly UI and offers many useful features.
The application is easily accessible and fast to deploy VMs.
Couldn't even add a firewall rule to a VM. Considering that Azure Portal website is buggy on mobile and cannot do it either, that is where you'd need this software.
Love it, saved my life a couple of times, was able to restart webapps while having dinner.
A very nice and essential app offers a good look inside the vast amount of information in the Azure cloud.
UI can be improved along with adding more features. Content refresh is a big concern with this app.
Handy for managing servers when away from computer and I find it much easier for simple tasks than full website.
One suggestion : Recent resources section should get cleared if the resources have been terminated. I had deleted VM but still showing in recent resources....
Easy to use on mobile devices!
Great app for Azure Admin on the go!
Shows nothing but general resource information. I'd expect at least a liitle bit of information beyond resource name and ID. I can't even see the money spent for this month.
Fingerprint unlock feature doesn't work. And the app takes frustrating long to respond even on a decent device processor and a decent network speed.

Obviously, this app wasn't made to do everything the web interface does, nor should it, but I think somet...Full ReviewPretty good. would be nice to include a way for the user to see costs, I would like to keep tabs on how much costs my VMs accrued this far for the month. i can do that from the web but not here. Thank you for the great app üëç

This is only a VM management tool with very limited functions. The app should be called something like Azure Virtual Resource Manager... I'd love to see a usable app with at least the same functionality like the basic Azure website

I can open AKS, but no visibility into nodes, pods, or con...Full ReviewOnly the most basic functionality is supported, which renders the app almost useless. Every time I open I end up having to load using my browser to get to the information I need. You can pull up AppInsights performance, but not dependencies. I can open AKS, but no visibility into nodes, pods, or containers. No log analytics, ect.
Brilliant app. I see it ain't more and me functionality from the online Azure dashboard. Keep up the great work!!

I had a choice: Buy a new workstation for around ¬£1000, or rent a VM on Azure at ¬£0.14 per hour (of use), costing me around ¬£300 per year. So glad I've chosen Azure. I can remote desktop into my VM from wherever I am, and even use my the Azure's built in RDC on my android tablet when out and about a...Full ReviewI had a choice: Buy a new workstation for around ¬£1000, or rent a VM on Azure at ¬£0.14 per hour (of use), costing me around ¬£300 per year. So glad I've chosen Azure. I can remote desktop into my VM from wherever I am, and even use my the Azure's built in RDC on my android tablet when out and about and it's just as if I'm sat in front of a high end workstation. Really love it.
Great app to control azure resources !
